articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Russia fines Google for failing to delete ‘false content’ about Ukraine war - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Since its invasion of Ukraine, Russia has ramped up its efforts to control online content it does not like.
articles.content:
Russia has fined Google 3 million rubles around 30,000 for not deleting what it says is fake news about the war in Ukraine.
A Moscow court found Google guilty on Thursday for failing to remove from … [+1529 chars]
